title: 20MIN Low Priority
body:
OK so i have an issue, I recently received a 20 minute low priority x 5 game ban/ punishment, I wouldn't have an issue with this if it was actually my fault, My internet crashed and the game was remade, BUT The issue that i'm having is the fact that i cannot get rid of my ban, Here is whats happening, I will start the search the 20 minute low prior wait time will start but my game also searches for a match at that same time, at exactly 8 minutes in automatically the game will stop searching for a match and remove me from "in-queue" to "online" but i'm still waiting for my 20 min low prior wait time to stop, as soon as the 20 minute stops i am returned to the main menu, where i have to search for a game again and restart my low prior gueue yet again, if anyone knows what i'm doing wrong how to fix this please let me know! {{champion:69}} 

Thanks :D

replies.body:
It sounds like you're not properly connecting to our matchmaking service to reach a champ select lobby. This is often caused by a poor connection to our servers that stems from an incompatible local network configuration. Working through the steps inside our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should help you resolve this issue for good.

Let me know if this helped.
